column2: Listening & Viewing

Listening and Viewing
LO1: Recognize sounds and words in context

Listening and Viewing
LO1: Develop positive listening and viewing attitudes, and behaviour

Listening and Viewing
LO2: Develop listening and viewing skills for understanding by focusing on literal and inferential meaning

Listening and Viewing
LO3: Develop critical listening and viewing by focusing on implied meaning, higher-order thinking, and evaluation

Listening and Viewing
LO4: Listen to, view, and respond to a variety of texts
Reading & Viewing
Letter Sounds

Reading and Viewing (Letter Sounds)
LO1: Develop reading and viewing readiness, word recognition skills, accuracy, fluency and positive reading and viewing attitudes and behaviour
Letter Names

Reading and Viewing (Letter Names)
LO1: Develop reading and viewing readiness, word recognition skills, accuracy, fluency and positive reading and viewing attitudes and behaviour
Oral Reading (phrases)

Reading and Viewing
LO1: Develop reading and viewing readiness, word recognition skills, accuracy, fluency and positive reading and viewing attitudes and behaviour
Oral Reading and Comprehension

Reading and Viewing
LO2: Process and comprehend age-/ year level-appropriate texts by focusing on literal and inferential meaning

Reading and Viewing
LO3: Analyse, evaluate and appreciate age-/ year level- appropriate texts by focusing on implied meaning, higher-order thinking and judgement

Reading and Viewing
LO4: Respond to a wide and extensive range of texts for enjoyment and understanding how grammatical/ lexical items and semiotic modes are used in diverse contexts
Speaking and Representing

Speaking and Representing
LO1: Develop knowledge and awareness of features of speaking and representing

Speaking and Representing
LO2: Develop accuracy and fluency in speaking and representing

Speaking and Representing
LO3: Explore, generate, develop and organise ideas respectfully as individuals and collaboratively in planned and/or spontaneous situations for a variety of purposes, audiences contexts and cultures

Speaking and Representing
LO4: Speak and represent confidently, coherently and cohesively for a variety of purposes, audiences, contexts and cultures

Speaking and Representing
LO5: Monitor, review, revise and refine responsibly before, during and after speaking and representing
Writing and Representing

Writing and Representing
LO1: Develop writing readiness and handwriting to write accurately and fluently

Writing and Representing
LO2: Use accurate and consistent spelling

Writing and Representing
LO3: Generate, select and organise ideas for writing and representing creatively and critically for a variety of purposes, audiences, contexts and cultures

Writing and Representing
LO4: Develop, organise and express ideas coherently, cohesively, creatively and critically in writing and representing to produce texts for a variety of purposes, audiences, contexts and cultures
Grammar

Grammar
LO1: Use metalanguage for learning and talking about language structures and language in use

Grammar
LO2: Apply knowledge of grammatical rules at word and phrase levels

Grammar
LO3: Apply knowledge of grammatical rules at sentence level

Grammar
LO4: Show understanding of how the purposeful use of language shapes meaning in texts
Vocabulary

Vocabulary
LO1: Develop word consciousness and use metalanguage in building vocabulary knowledge

Vocabulary
LO2: Build rich vocabulary knowledge that supports the development of listening, reading, viewing, speaking, writing and representing skills

Vocabulary
LO3: Use words appropriate for purpose, audience, context and culture
